text: Podu Iloaiei is a town in Iași County, Western Moldavia, Romania. It has 9,573 inhabitants as of 2011, and was declared a town in 2005. Four villages are administered by the town: Budăi, Cosițeni, Holm and Scobâlțeni. ==Population== ==See also== * Battle of Podu Iloaiei ==References== ==External links== Category:Towns in Romania Category:Populated places in Iași County Category:Localities in Western Moldavia
title: Podu Iloaiei
